about_the_game:
The Illusionist

The Illusionist is a sorceress of Sand and Time. With a flick of her wrist, she conjures ethereal Sand Guardians to do her bidding, while her command over time and space bends reality itself to her whims.

Playstyle:
The Illusionist excels in strategic manipulation of the battlefield, weaving spells and summoning allies to control the flow of combat. Players who choose this class will enjoy the challenge of managing both offensive and defensive tactics, using their Sand Guardians or exploiting temporal magic to obliterate their foes.

Recommended for:

  • Players who enjoy a safer caster mage type of game play.
  • Those who revel in the power of summoning a high quantity of minions that seek and destroy enemies.

Embrace the powers of Sand and Time, and become the master of illusionary warfare!
